availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Jean Victor Marie Moreau (France, Napoleonic-era General.)

body.p: France, Napoleonic-era General. Native of France. Married to Eug√©nie Hulot in Paris on November 9, 1800. Served as Brigadier General and General for the First French Republic from December 20, 1793, to December 25, 1800. Arrested in 1804 for plotting to overthrow the First Consul. Exiled to the United States in 1804. Served in the Russian army as a General from August 17, 1813, until August 27, 1813. Mortally wounded at the Battle of Dresden on August 27, 1813.
